headline: CVC strikes $1.6bn deal for US private credit group Marathon
summary: Private capital group CVC has struck an agreement to acquire credit manager Marathon Asset Management for up to $1.6bn in the latest in a wave...

raw.headline: CVC strikes $1.6bn deal for US private credit group Marathon
raw.summary: Private capital group CVC has struck an agreement to acquire credit manager Marathon Asset Management for up to $1.6bn in the latest in a wave...

headline: 2 Insurance Stocks on Our Buy List and 1 We Turn Down
summary: Insurance companies serve as the backbone of risk management, providing essential protection and financial security for individuals and businesses. But worries about an economic slowdown and potential claims deterioration have kept sentiment in check, and over the past six months, the industry’s 2.8% return has trailed the S&P 500 by 5.4 percentage points.
